body_html:
Ran into this. The following fix works:

 flat_input = tuple(array_ops.transpose(input_, [1, 0] +range(2,input_.get_shape().ndims))
                       for input_ in flat_input)

and, similarly for Line 843:

      flat_output = [array_ops.transpose(output, [1, 0] + range(2,output.get_shape().ndims))
                     for output in flat_output]

Fix in pull request: #5142

                       for input_ in flat_input)

and, similarly for Line 843:

body:
Ran into this. The following fix works:

```
 flat_input = tuple(array_ops.transpose(input_, [1, 0] +range(2,input_.get_shape().ndims))
                       for input_ in flat_input)
```

and, similarly for [Line 843](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/33b336ada58529d5e0398feea423785f1c3d57c1/tensorflow/python/ops/rnn.py#L843):

```
      flat_output = [array_ops.transpose(output, [1, 0] + range(2,output.get_shape().ndims))
                     for output in flat_output]
```

Fix in pull request: #5142
